A knee is a joint in the leg. It is the meeting point of the thigh with the lower leg. The knee joins the thigh bone (the femur) with the shin bone (the tibia). The smaller bone that runs alongside the tibia (and together they form the 'shin') is called the fibula.
The elbow is a hinge joint, which connects the humerus in the upper arm with the radius and ulna in the forearm.
